beer.beer_description:
Fieles a una receta 칰nica desde 1904, los maestros cerveceros de Cruzcampo miman y cuidan cada paso del proceso de elaboraci칩n.

Desde los ingredientes: elaborada 칰nicamente con cebada, l칰pulo de primera calidad y una levadura exclusiva que le dan un sabor 칰nico.
En su proceso de elaboraci칩n 칰nico: sin pasteurizar y exclusivamente en fr칤o, para proteger su sabor y fuerza del impacto de la temperatura, que supone la pasteurizaci칩n garantizando as칤 su frescura y sabor 칰nico. Por eso decimos que la ca침a Cruzcampo es la cerveza m치s fresca.
Con su servicio, un estilo de tiraje exclusivo a -2췈 y sin a침adir espuma de m치s al final.
Todo, para disfrutar de la ca침a perfecta.

A refreshing Spanish beer, sticking to its original recipe since 1904. Easy to drink, with a thirst quenching bitterness.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 265 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 54! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 130 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 27!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That뗩 35 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Get your dance shoes on, and grab a beer! Although when you realize it뗩 a brew from Espa침a, you may want to sit down and enjoy the flavor of Spain! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from Spain. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what뗩 on tap! That's 5 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 5 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you뗣l be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

A refreshing Spanish beer, sticking to its original recipe since 1904. Easy to drink, with a thirst quenching bitterness.

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 5 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you뗣l be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 5 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 2!
